item.title: Don’t ‘Compromise’ Your Code Amid Malware Mayhem
item.description: Code Signing Certificates demand a price premium in the underground online marketplace. This is no surprise considering that criminals sometimes use them to dupe their potential victims into installing malware in their machine.
